statements: SELECT * FROM pharmacogenomics_data;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name FROM pharmacogenomics_data WHERE dosage > 100;
SELECT genetic_info, dosage FROM pharmacogenomics_data WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM pharmacogenomics_data WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin' ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM pharmacogenomics_data;
SELECT * FROM pharmacogenomics_data ORDER BY patient_id ASC, drug_name DESC;
SELECT drug_name, genetic_info FROM pharmacogenomics_data WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS total_patients, AVG(dosage) AS avg_dosage FROM pharmacogenomics_data WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT MAX(dosage) AS max_dosage, MIN(dosage) AS min_dosage FROM pharmacogenomics_data WHERE genetic_info LIKE '%ABCD%';
SELECT genetic_info, AVG(dosage) AS avg_dosage FROM pharmacogenomics_data GROUP BY genetic_info HAVING AVG(dosage) > 75;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE dosage = '10mg';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1980-01-01';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients ORDER BY gender DESC;
SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, m.medication_name FROM patients p JOIN medications m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_genetics;
SELECT patient_id, genetic_info FROM patient_genetics ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM drug_list WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT * FROM treatment WHERE treatment_id = 3;
SELECT drug_name, patient_id FROM treatment JOIN drug_list ON treatment.drug_id = drug_list.drug_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_genetics;
SELECT patient_id, genetic_info FROM patient_genetics WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM drug_list ORDER BY dosage DESC;

SELECT patient_genetics.patient_id, patient_genetics.genetic_info, drug_list.drug_name FROM patient_genetics INNER JOIN treatment ON patient_genetics.patient_id = treatment.patient_id INNER JOIN drug_list ON treatment.drug_id = drug_list.drug_id;

SELECT treatment.treatment_id, patient_genetics.patient_id, drug_list.drug_id, drug_list.drug_name FROM treatment LEFT JOIN patient_genetics ON treatment.patient_id = patient_genetics.patient_id LEFT JOIN drug_list ON treatment.drug_id = drug_list.drug_id WHERE drug_list.dosage > 100;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, genetic_information FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, drug_type FROM Drugs ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, drug_id, dosage FROM Treatments WHERE dosage > 100;
SELECT gene_name, variant_type FROM GeneticVariants LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT drug_name FROM Drugs ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, drug_name, dosage FROM Patients INNER JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE dosage > 100;
SELECT gene_name, variant_type FROM GeneticVariants WHERE variant_type = 'mutation';
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, genetic_information FROM Patient;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM Drug WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT * FROM Prescription WHERE prescription_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT gene_name, allele FROM Genotype ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, genetic_information FROM Patient WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM Drug ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, drug_id, prescription_date FROM Prescription WHERE prescription_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT gene_name, allele FROM Genotype WHERE allele LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY gene_name;
